description:
In our modern society dealing with information is what we do almost all the time. In most cases we just read new information and try to get the most out of them. The endless amount of mails and papers we have to read everyday can be extremly tim consuming, that's why this course tries to improve your reading style and help you save a lot of time.

The concept:

With as little time as possible you will learn all the information you need to become a speed reading expert. One introduction video will give you some important backgrounds of speed reading. One theory video and one practice video per week over the period of three weeks will show you how speed reading really works. In addition to watching these two videos per week you should practice the given exercices for at least 20 minutes every day.

The Content:

Week One:

  • Basic reading problems
  • Solve reading problem regression
  • Improve your eye focus
  • Non Speed Reading problems
  • Stop Subvocalisation
  • Best Apps for Speed Reading

Week Two:

  • Different reading types
  • Increase Comprehension by previewing
  • Techniques to increase retention
  • Imporving horizontal and vertical vision

Week Three:

  • Best eye training exercises
  • The Keyword system
  • Advanced reading strategies
  • Limits of Speed Reading
  • Further reading

A great way to invest in your future

The ROI of Speed Reading is incredible! After these three weeks you could save about 120 hours of lifetime every year from now on! How could you say no to this chance of life improvement?
title: Save time by learning many proven strategies of SpeedReading
